= BAJOSBOOT Sources=
in preparation<br>
The BAJOSBOOT Sources are all Javafiles and Classes that can be used.

The Source directory itself contains the packages of Bajos.

*packages*:

 * java
   * graphics
   * io
   * lang
   * util

 * platform
   * 32 Bit and 64 Bit PC-linux
   * MICA2 Board
   * Charon2
   * NGW100
   * STK1000
   * ArduinoMega
   * EVK1100
   * [http://code.google.com/p/bajos/wiki/EVK1104 EVK1104]
   * XPLAIN- board
